title: Perv - A Love Story
description: Fresh from the success of his hugely successful memoir, "Permanent Midnight", Stahl makes his sensational fiction debut with this whacked-out, sometimes wrenching, tour de force that's destined for cult-classicdom. Film and TV rights have been sold to Showtime for a two-hour movie and TV series.In 1970 sixteen-year-old Bobby Stark runs away with Michelle, who is escaping from the Hare Krishna cult she ran to to get away from an abusive father, but on their way to San Francisco they are picked up by two hippies, Meat and Varnish, who threaten tomake their lives even more difficult.
author: Jerry Stahl
